[Exercise 13.3](ex_3/)

For each of the following statements, either prove it is true or give a
counterexample.

1.  If $P(a {{\,|\,}}b, c) = P(b {{\,|\,}}a, c)$, then
    $P(a {{\,|\,}}c) = P(b {{\,|\,}}c)$

2.  If $P(a {{\,|\,}}b, c) = P(a)$, then $P(b {{\,|\,}}c) = P(b)$

3.  If $P(a {{\,|\,}}b) = P(a)$, then
    $P(a {{\,|\,}}b, c) = P(a {{\,|\,}}c)$
